title: Love Him Madly: Murder at the Whisky
description: Los Angeles, January 1968When one of her dearest friends is savagely murdered practically in front of her, backstage at the Sunset Strip's famed Whisky A Go-Go, reporter Rennie Stride vows to hunt down whoever did it.Even if it means blasting the hip Laurel Canyon music scene down to bedrock until she gets to the truth.In the course of pursuing the killer, Rennie finds the love of her life. And risks her own life--and his--in the process. "Love Him Madly: Murder at the Whisky" is the third of The Rock & Roll Murders: The Rennie Stride Mysteries, a series of novels set in the Sixties music scenes of San Francisco, Los Angeles, New York and London.
author: Patricia Morrison
